text: Saya belum sempat menginap di penginapan ini. Saya datang ke sini untuk santap malam. Lokasinya agak jauh dari pusat kota Magelang. Namun, perjalanan ke sana relatif mudah walau sepi. text: Saya seorang dokter dari Jakarta, bersama seorang kawan ke sana bulan lalu, saya pergi ke kota Magelang dan singgah di Villa Sumbing Indah.. Saat itu sudah malam hari, ketika saya sudah di bungalow, saya merasakan nuansa sangat klasik nan eksotis  dalam kamar, dengan ranjang berkelambu, dan ornamen kayu yang cantik...Kamar mandi nya pun amat bersih, air panas okay dan saya langsung tertidur pulas, Ketika bangun keesokan harinya, saya melihat pemandangan yang mencengangkan, suasana pedesaan yang indah dan asri dengan sawah membentang depan saya, dikelilingi perbukitan, gunung Merbabu dan gunung Sumbing. Breakfastnya sangat enak, kebutuhan kami dilayani oleh staf hotel yang sangat ramah, sabar  dan murah senyum.  Kolam renangnya pun bening dan bagus sekali dan ber jam jam saya menghabiskan waktu berenang di dalamnya. Hanya 2 hari saya disitu sebelum saya kembali lagi ke Jakarta, dan ketika sampai Jakarta pun ingatan saya pada Villa Sumbing tidak bisa hilang..  Saya berencana tiap melakukan trip ke daerah Jawa Tengah udah pasti mampirnya ke Villa Sumbing indah ini.. Thx Mrs.  Ruby, Thanks Mr. Chris.. You re all nice people and i promise I will be back to your exotic hotel..

text:
Saya menginap di Villa Sumbing Indah selama tiga hari dengan suami dan kedua anak saya. Disana saya mendapatkan ketentraman dan kenyamanan yang luar biasa. Saya di jemput di Bandara Jogjakarta, pada hari itu pesawat saya tertunda selama  1 jam, dan begitu menyenangkan driver tetap menunggu sampai saya datang dan sudah mebawa papan nama dan air mineral untuk saya dan keluarga.
Sesampai disana, saya langsung mendapatkan "welcome drink", dan sambutan ramah luar biasa dari pemilik hotel "Ibu Rubi & Mr. Christophe" dan para staff. Amazing....
Selama menginap disana, saya mendapatkan pelayanan yg luar biasa. Pemilik hotel membantu saya untuk memilih tempat wisata yang bisa dikunjungi. Saya mengunjungi Candi Selogriyo, candi kecil di perbukitan dengan pemandangan yang sangat indah.
Restaurant yang menyediakan beraneka ragam makanan, dan yang paling saya suka adalah "steak Rib Eye" daging sapi dengan saus yang sangat enak sekali dan yang paling istimewa dari sini yaitu pemilik hotel sendiri yang memasak steak nya dan harganya pun standar.
Kamar tidur yang sangat nyaman, bersih, dengan air hangat  dan pemandangan luar kamar yang begitu indah dengan kolam renang langsung didepan kamar, menambah kesempurnaan liburan kami saat itu. Anak-anak saya sangat senang setiap kali bangun tidur bisa langsung berenang.
Overall... Saya sangat merekomendasikan tempat ini sebagai tempat liburan yang sangat nyaman, menyenangkan dan SEMPURNA....
title: Surga di Pegunungan Sumbing....Luar Biasa.....

text:
Sebuah villa yang sangat recommended sekali untuk berlibur melepas penat dari hiruk pikuk keramaian. Villa Sumbing Indah terletak di Kalegen, Bandongan , Jawa Tengah hanya 15 menit dari pusat kota. Perjalan yang sangat menyenangkan, melihat asrinya alam pedesaan yang alami. Saya menginap 2 malam di kamar family bersama teman-teman.
Pemilik, Pak Christophe dan Ibu Rubiyanti yang sangat ramah dan memberikan informasi yang sangat baik kepada kami. Memberikan rekomendasi wisata disekitar Villa. Staf yang sangat baik dan ramah, berpakaian rapi dan sopan serta tutur kata yang menyenangkan. Sungguh sebuah penginapan yang luar biasa, seperti milik pribadi. Kamar yang nyaman dan fasilitas yang lengkap,wifi disemua area, kolam renang, pemandangan yang amazing..
Dan juga restoran Prancis yang menawarkan dan menyediakan makanan dan minuman istimewa, tidak dapat ditemukan ditempat lain. Steak yang luar biasa sangat enak, dimasak langsung oleh pemiliknya. Yang saya dan teman-teman suka adalah Steak wagyu, Chocolate Lava, Mix Fresh Juice dan salad sangat luar biasa.
Pasti kami kembali lagi ke Villa Sumbing Indah

text:
Hotel ini bukanlah khas hotel turis. Hotelnya kecil tanpa layanan kamar, lemari es atau minibar. Pilihan yang sangat cocok bagi kami. Tuan rumah, layanan dan staf sangat penuh perhatian. Mereka menyediakan sopir untuk perjalanan kami, memberikan saran untuk tour yang baik, dan memberikan minuman gratis ketika kami tiba kembali. Hotel ini cukup jauh dari hiruk pikuk kota yang indah namun ini berarti bahwa pilihan untuk makanan sangat terbatas kecuali makanan hotel yang merupakan paduan indonesia & masakan perancis. Kami ingin menikmati masakan indonesia, tapi pilihan sangat terbatas. 
Pada hari terakhir tuan rumah Yanti & Christoff memberi kami berbagai macam teh jahe yang mereka beli kusus untuk kami(setelah kami menikmati begitu banyak teh jahe mereka selama disini).

Lokasi hotel sangat indah jika anda ingin (seperti yang kami inginkan) menjauhkan diri dari kebisingan kota dan asap. Hotel ini berada di antara merapi & Sumbing dan pemandangan yang bagus ke arah keduanya. Hotel ini dikelilingi oleh sawah dan itu adalah pengalaman yang luar biasa untuk berjalan melalui sawah dan desa-desa setempat dengan penduduk setempat sangat ramah dan menyambut (kami bahkan diundang ke rumah satu orang, sangat menyenangkan). 

Jika anda bukan penidur yang lelap, pastikan untuk membawa sumpalan telinga. Panggilan terdengar mulai di jam 3:00 pagi dan berlanjut sepanjang hari intermittantly, dan selesai sekitar jam 20:00 - 21:00. Panggilan terdengar lebih keras karena lokasi yang tinggi dan tanpa kebisingan kota untuk menyerap suara. 

Cuaca di juli adalah sempurna bagi kami.

Secara umum kami menikmati penginapan di hotel 'keluarga' ini.
title: Jauh dari kota karena kabut asap & kebisingan

text:
Hotel dengan nuansa etnik yang terletak di kaki gunung Sumbing, jauh dari keramaian. Pemandangan yang indah disertai dengan pelayanan yang ramah dan restoran dengan rasa yang enak serta harga terjangkau.

Meskipun hotel ini hanya memiliki 5 kamar, tetapi kolam renangnya cukup besar.
Sebaiknya lakukan reservasi terlebih dahulu karena jumlah kamar yang sedikit.

Ukuran kamar cukup luas. Saya menempati family room (2 bedrooms + living room). Keseluruhan kamar mempunyai teras dan menghadap ke kolam renang.

Wifi cukup memuaskan.

Meskipun lokasi hotel ini agak jauh dari pusat kota Magelang dan tidak ada angkutan umum, layak untuk dijadikan pilihan bagi yang ingin berlibur mencari ketenangan.

Kalau kesini, jangan lupa mencicipi steak di restorannya yang enak & terjangkau.

Yang tidak saya sukai di hotel ini hanyalah shower mandinya yang terletak di langit-langit (plafond).
title: Ethnic Hotel Yang Nyaman

text:
Pengalaman kami di Villa Sumbing Indah saat menginap pada Mei 2013 cukup menyenangkan.

Layanan yang diberikan para staf sejak saat pengaturan akomodasi lewat email hingga saat check-out dari resor amat bagus.

Resor ini terletak di tengah suasan desa, sekitar 1,5 jam perjalanan dari Bandara Internasional Adi Sucipto. Candi Prambanan (sekitar 0,5 jam perjalanan dari Bandara Internasional Adi Sucipto) berjarak sekitar 2 jam perjalanan dari resor, dan candi Borobudur sekitar 0,75 jam perjalanan (dengan kondisi lalu lintas yang lancar pada pukul 4 pagi) dari resor. Dengan demikian, jika tiba di Yogyakarta pada pagi hari, mengunjungi Candi Prambanan sebelum mendatangi resor mungkin merupakan gagasan bagus (matahari terbenam di Yogyakarta dan Borobudur kira-kira adalah pada jam 17.30).

Transportasi ke dan dari bandara dan juga tempat-tempat wisata seperti Candi Prambanan, Candi Borobudur dan Dataran Tinggi Kaliadem bisa diatur oleh resort dengan biaya sekitar Rp 1.300.000,- (USD 130) di luar biaya parkir. Sekalipun ini cara yang nyaman untuk pergi berkeliling tempat-tempat menarik (khususnya karena mencari taksi di lokasi resor yang terpencil tampaknya merupakan hal yang tak mungkin), harga ini cukup mahal mengingat biaya taksi argometer dari bandara ke resort pulang pergi hanyalah sebesrar Rp 300.000,- (USD 30).

Resor ini hanya memiliki beberapa vila dan sebagian besar berjarak hanya beberapa langkah dari kolam renang bersama, sehingga memberi perasaan cukup eksklusif. Kamarnya tidak ada AC tapi disediakan kipas angin di kamar tidur sehingga cukup dingin dan nyaman. Kamar mandi dilengkapi pancuran air dan sekalipun ada pipa air panas, air panasnya tampaknya sering terhenti di tengah mandi. Handuk pada dasarnya bersih dan disediakan peralatan mandi sederhana seperti sabun cair dan shampo tapi tidak ada pengering rambut.

Di sekitar resor hampir tidak ada toko atau restoran. Resor ini memiliki restoran dengan menu yang terdiri dari campuran hidangan barat dan asia. Sarapan sudah termasuk dalam harga kamar, paket sarapan (terdiri dari roti tawar dan buah-buahan) disediakan sebelum berangkat pada pukul 4 pagi untuk wisata matahari terbit di Borobudur. Sekalipun bukan paket sarapan yang lezat, tapi sudah cukup untuk menambal perut saat mendaki dan berjalan di Candi Borobudur di saat dini hari.

Secara ringkas, Villa Sumbing Indah memberikan layanan yang berkualitas cukup tinggi dalam hal perhatian dan kecepatan tanggapan dan akomodasi yang bagus dengan gaya resor di situasi yang tenang dan ideal untuk orang-orang yang mencari tempat yang tenang dan tentram saat mengunjungi candi Prambanan dan Borobudur. Namun biaya transportasi yang disediakan resor cukup mahal. Mungkin, harga paket yang termasuk antar jemput bandara-resort dan juga perjalanan wisata bisa diberikan untuk memberi biaya transportasi yang lebih menarik. Juga kualitas paket sarapan perlu diperbaiki.
title: Tempat menginap yang nyaman dan tenang saat menjelajahi Borobudur dan Yogyakarta.

text: Hotel yang amat mengagumkan dengan staf yang menyenangkan di lokasi pedesaan yang indah. Kamar-kamar luas dengan gaya lokal, teras privat yang bagus di luar kamar dengan perabotan yang nyaman, taman yang indah, kolam renang ekstra besar, makanan yang enak di restoran. Kami senang sikap pemiliknya yang kembali ke layanan paling mendasar, sekalipun mereka menciptakan tempat yang dapat memenuhi standar kenyamanan modern. Selain itu perjalanan yang mereka tawarkan, dan juga transportasi ke bandara dan stasiun kereta amat OK. Kami akan merekomendasikan vila ini kepada teman-teman kami di Prancis dan Belanda.
title: Hotel "jatuh cinta"

text:
Hotel ini terletak di sebuah lokasi yang amat menyenangkan di lereng gunung Sumbing dekat sebuah dusun bernama Bandegon. Sulit untuk ditemukan, khususnya karena peta di situs web hotel kurang tepat.
Bagi Anda yang memakan GPS di ponsel cerdas atau iPad, ini adalah koordinatnya: S 07-27'-14" E 110-09'-24" terletak di jalan antara Magelang ke Kalegen.

Bangunan hotel bergaya Indonesia dan tidak ada AC. Ternyata bukan masalah di saat itu (Oktober) karena terletak di ketinggian 400m atau 1200ft dan cukup sejuk pada malam hari. Saya agak ragu di saat-saat yang lebih panas. Di kamar kami juga ada kipas angin yang juga membantu.
Karena gaya bangunannya maka kamar tidak sepenuhnya tertutup dari serangga sehingga lebih baik agar semua pintu dan jendela tetap tertutup. Tempat tidur dilengkapi kelambu yang bisa ditutup pada saat beranjak tidur.
Kamarnya bergaya Indonesia dengan teras untuk bersantai. Pada saat kami berkunjung, kolam renang tampak bersih, tapi kami tak memakainya. Kamar mandi nyaman dan semua bekerja dengan baik tapi jangan gusar jika melihat satu atau dua serangga. Para staf sudah bekerja keras untuk mengusirnya.
Sarapan di restoran amat sedap dan tentunya lokasinya amat bagus. Di malam hari kami makan malam berdua di sana, dapat direkomendasikan.
Secara keseluruhan, ini tempat bagi orang yang suka perjalanan berkeliling dan melihat pedesaan yang sebenarnya, tapi tidak bisa hidup tanpa kemewahan hotel bintang lima sehingga amat direkomendasikan. Kami mengambil mobil dengan pengemudi untuk satu hari dengan biaya Rp 600.000 ($60) ditambah bensin ($9) dan mengingat pengemudinya baik dan aman dan mobilnya luas di tambah seorang pembantu yang bisa berbahasa Inggris, maka harga itu masuk akal.
title: Tempat menginap yang menyenangkan tapi ada beberapa komentar.

text: Yanti and her husband Christophe have created an oasis amidst the hills of Sumbing vulcano. They provide an excellent service, best French breakfast ever and immaculately clean and cosy rooms. Excellent money for value ratio.
title: Warmhearted hospitality

text:
Great place great food great service great pool !

We love the place, a palace between the rice fields.  The owner is great and the staff is very friendly. Rooms are great and the restaurant is full of local people at lunch.
title: Wonderful place

text:
We spent 4 nights in a familial housing at Villa Sumbing with our two kids. Great experience. Yanti, Christophe, all the staff as well as drivers/guide were all very nice and make our stay a memorable experience. The Villa is super clean, food of great quality with a super view :) Christophe perfectly arranged our transfert from Yogykarta airport, our trip to Borobodur as well as our transfert to Dieng. 
We will come back for sure hopefully with some our friends !
We fully recommend with no restriction !
title: Top !

text:
We were there with our family and friends. Our wishes was to discover rice field and small village as well as Borobudur Temple. The place is fantastic, big swimming pool, friendly staff who bring fresh fruit juice when we came back from ou walk around, the room are great with several small place to read and enjoy scenery around. What we appreciated the most was the organization by Christophe for our trip around, rice field by walking from the villa was incredible, Sumbing Volcano ascent for sunset and sunrise unforgettable (take something to be warm it’s very cold on top during the night), Borobudur visit perfectly organized with breakfast on the way. We enjoy bakso (local dishes) in small village around for lunch and we feeling we really discovered the real Java.
Christophe organized our trip from Yogyakarta to Bromo, Ijen and then Bali perfectly, train ticket, perfect driver, and a great guide Agus who accompany us and help us to discover everything. All was under control with the style we loved, authentic and close to local with good level of confort in a friendly atmosphere.
Thank you Christophe and Antie you organized for us and our family friends, who usually organized our trip ourselves, a fantastic discovery of Java.
I don’t forget the great food in your restaurant, the fantastic Javanese villa with its garden for our friends and our aperitif every evening, the wakeup by Christophe to enjoy a fantastic sunrise with 5 volcanos view, the view on rice field every morning from our room and all the small kindness who delight us every moments.
The children continue during the rest of our trip to speak about you and the time they enjoy with you.
The feeling to have now new friends in Java.
title: A fantastic place to discover Java

text: Villa Sumbing is a wonderful choice if you are visiting Borobudur or Magelang. The accommodation was fabulous, service fantastic and the food outstanding . Breakfast was wonderful each morning also. The pool area is lovely to return to each day and the chaise lounges by the pool with the view of Merapi are hard to beat. The French food was just the icing on the cake. Villa Sumbing is worth the visit alone to Java. The mountain setting, gardens, rain shower and wonderful service are what holiday dreams are made of . I am looking forward to my next visit.
title: Sensational Villa Sumbing

text:
A very Nice couple Christophe and Yanti welcomes you. Restaurant is generous.  Hotel is hightly confortable.  They make everything for you to spend a wonderful time. They arrange trips for you at a the best rate you can find and do anything they can to make your stay as easy, confortable and kind as possible.  
Big rooms, large swimming pool, good guides. Well à very nice place To stay.
Thank you !
title: Great and Perfect

photos.caption: Swimming pool at night and cottage in the backyard
Swimming pool at night and cottage in the backyard

text: Villa Sumbing Indah is a lovely small resort on the slopes of Gunung Sumbing. Very friendly owners who welcome you upon arrival and make yourself feel at home all the time. Spacious rooms, nicely decorated, and a refreshing pool. Good restaurant with plenty of choices and delicious breakfast. The rooms however would benefit hugely from installing airconditioning as it gets warm and stuffy during the day and it doesn't really cools off much at night, despite a mobile fan provided. This also means the odd critters in the room (frogs, cockroaches, lizards). Also challenging by times to get hot water out of the taps. However, overall a good place to stay.
title: Friendly and welcoming accommodation

text:
We really enjoyed our stay here. We booked 2 rooms and stayed in villa 3 and 4.
Small but beautifully landscaped grounds..nice pool, which we didn't get time to sample as it was rainy season. Loved being so close to paddy fields and the local village.
Rooms were large, soft beds and lovely terrace. Wifi was very good, tv in room, but didn't switch on so not sure what channels it had. Water cooler in room, which didn't cool, but did heat, tea and coffee provided. No aircon, but stand alone fan provided, which we didn't need as was rather cool while we were there. Rooms could do with some updating, they were a little damp and would benefit from some comfy indoor furniture and a lick of paint. Shower in villa 3 needs a new head and the temperature of the shower was very hit and miss, sometimes freezing for ages and sometimes boiling hot. 
What makes it a great place to stay is the staff, always friendly and attentive! Tours were great and Argus who took us everywhere was a safe driver and willing to go out of his way. Borobudur was lovely and reasonably quiet at sunrise. Favourite trip was hiking around the rice terraces to a small temple, absolutely perfect, amazing views, wonderful people. 
Returning each day to a freshly made up room, fresh juice and a treat from the kitchen was wonderful. 
Restaurant food was well priced and tasty. Breakfast was ample and delicious. 

Would have given 5 stars but for the shower and lack of hairdryer and fridge. 
Would certainly recommend and return though.
title: Tranquil

text: Tonight is our last night here we absolutely love this place could be our favourite ever it has style class everything anyone could wish for made to feel welcome by everybody food excellent swimming pool perfect surroundings unforgettable staff amazing
title: Romantic

text:
We stayed 2 nights in this hotel that is ideally located near some great turistic activities. We had some hiking tours well organised with waterfall and rice terraces. Borobudur is close and Jogyakarta / Prembanan quite close / doable in a day visit.
The hotel has a very large pool and great views on the mountains and rice terraces. The rooms are facing the pool and there is a separated large house for a family. We took this one and that was just perfect. The restaurant is ok. Very efficient assistance from the staff and owner. I would recommend this place to anyone willing to enjoy Java.
title: Very nice family run hotel ideally located

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We came to Java from Bali , landing in yogjakarta. Depending on the traffic you may need up to two hours to get there. But being far enough from the city has its advantages: you are in the middle of the countryside. The views are wonderful ( you can see 3 volcanoes and the place is neighboring the rice field). You have nice walks around the village. 
But what we liked the most was the decoration inside the rooms and village, swimming pool ( long and not deep, perfect for adults and for our 7 years old son) but for all the owner and the staff, always kind and helpfull, be it in the restaurant, cleaning staff, drivers or the reception. They always did a little extra to make us feeling well. We have spent there 3 nights but would love to stay more.

This place is for the nature lovers, wonderful plants like vanilla, pepper, orchids, coconut and many more. You can also cross some animals, none of them dangerous but this is the countryside in the tropical area so don't expect the sterile environment like the moon ;)

The only little problem was the wake prayer call from the Mosque at 4:30 but Java is Muslim (in majority),after the song I continued to sleep :).

We strongly recommend this place , same as its restaurant .
title: Beautiful resort with lovely staff

owner_response.text: We are very happy to have stink to receive you has VILLA SUMBING INDAH, we thank you, in name of all the team to have come visit us. We shall keep a good memory of your passage and hope to be able to receive you has new during a next stay. All the staff of villa sumbing indah yanti and christophe
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We hoped to see Borobudur and also get out into the countryside and this hotel was a great choice for that. The garden and pool are lovely, and the staff even gave us a great map for a walk in the neighborhood which was one of the highlights of our trip! 

We didn't have as good of an experience with dinners at the hotel as others on here had. Perhaps because it was low season and a different chef? But since you don't really have other options for meals in the area you will likely eat here. We had several meals and different dishes and didn't really find much tasty.

text:
On a holiday trip to Indonesia, I had the pleasure to spend a few days in a lovely small hotel, near Magelang, Central Java. This place, called VILLA SUMBING INDAH, is located in the middle of a beautiful landscape of ricefields and mountains. It is managed by a French-Indonesian couple, who go out of their way to please their guests, as does the perfectly trained staff. There are 8 rooms and one house, all in traditional style but very comfortable and well equipped (bathrooms, kitchens, etc.), as well as a large swimming pool. The cooking is excellent (Indonesian and French) and they can send a car with a driver to pick up their guests from the airport or organize sightseeing tours (to Jogyakarta, Borobudur Temple, etc). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED !

Elisabeth STOLLE – Belgium and France

text: There are 5 rooms in this quaint little villa lining the side of the pool. The view is awesome as it is in the mountainous region, hence good air and slightly cooler temperature. Rooms are not air conditioned but equipped with standing fans. The rooms are clean in general though we felt that the towels and bedsheets could have been cleaned more thoroughly. Owner and Staff are very polite and helpful though with limited English. As the villa is located in a deserted area, you either have your meals before returning to the villa or simply enjoy the quaint little restaurant in the villa with a number of French dishes. Our favorite main course was the chicken steak cooked with mushroom cream sauce. In general, they serve good quality food at a decent price. Breakfast was simple with a bread basket, eggs as you would like them to be cooked, local fruits and fresh juice, tea & coffee. If you intend to have lots of sightseeing outside of Magelang, be prepared to hire a driver as moving anywhere will typically take 2-3 hrs. Borobudur was just 30mins drive as we hit the roads at 4am to catch sunrise at Borobudur! It's worth getting up early!
title: Quaint Villa tucked away from the hustle bustle

I have been there a few times with my wife and daughters, we totally love the location (around 600 meters above sea level): on Mt Sumbing slopes, with amazing views to Merapi and Merbabu volcanoes (wake up for sunrise!), surrounded by ricefields... 

Regarding the rooms, we stayed once in a "standard room" which is huge and comes with a living room area and can more than easily accomodate an extra person with an extra bed. We've also slept in the wooden "Joglo" traditional Javanese house which is so beautiful and has a private garden. 

The food is very good. They cook their own bread and the breakfast is just huge with also homemade marmelade and imported butter. If you like steacks you'll have a lot of choice! They have a large choice of pizzas even make their own foie gras and paté ;-)

This place is a must if you want to stay around Borobudur/Magelang area! And the owners Christophe and Yanti (french-indonesian couple) are extremely welcoming and do everything they can to make you feel home. Thumbs up!

text:
Normally, I can understand the judgments on tripadvisor – even if I do not share them, I can see where they are coming from, and some positive judgments I simply interpret as negative for me or the other way round, depending on the backgrounds of the users or the objects of praise or criticism. But in this case, I am really experiencing some cognitive dissonance – I think the Villa is too hyped up, and I cannot really understand why and by whom.  Mind you – this is in many ways not a bad place, but this cavalcade of ooooos and hardly any ooos makes hardly any sense to me.  (ooos and oos seem to get consistently very peeved and unusually insulted comments from the owner side, but that can hardly be the cause?) What am I missing here?  

The Villa’s good sides include for instance the restaurant (reviewed separately).  The design is overall very nice.  The air is great.  The staff and one of the owners are very friendly and courteous.   The pool is great for lap swimming and for playing around.  The apartments are spacious, the individual loggias are nicely conceived, done, and furnished.  The landscape backdrops with volcano, rice paddies, flowers and plants are great.  Prices are very fair. The free fruit smoothies are nice as such and as a gesture. 

But for a ooooo, there are too many downsides for me, and even a oooo would seem a stretch.  Some of the cons are not really the fault of the owners, and one could perhaps know about them in advance, but still they are there – such as that the place is extremely noisy as regards the local mosque (longer, louder and more often than usual and even legal in Indonesia); that it is in the middle of nowhere but not in a country setting but within a village; and that there is no aircondition (fine at night but quite stuffy during the day), and thus some issue with the mosquitoes (they will get you).  Some have to do with the design – the property is not parky at all but quite narrow around pool and buildings; apartments are dark and stuffy; there is relatively little privacy.  I found the large bird volières at the entrance full of too many birds and not clean enough, and basically they made for a sad atmosphere.

Other cons would be ameliorable – such as getting better mattresses and pillows (for me they were ergonomically quite a challenge); working showers (right now it is impossible to adjust the temperature for more than a minute); toilets that are acoustically separate from the bedroom; working mosquito repellants and nets; a small desk or non-couch table; sufficient plugs for our times; if no refrigerator then a water cooler that cools the water.  

I should also reiterate what some, but not most, reviewers have mentioned: The male owner was, if not actively unfriendly, then also not friendly; he was running around topless, hanging out on the net all the time, but did not bother once to even say hello.  Not even a nod by a “patron” is really something unusual, but it seems not all guests (especially not the Francophone ones) get this treatment.  Of course owners can do what they like and there is no obligation for them to even be polite, but it does create a peculiar atmosphere for those who are on the receiving end of this behavior.

Finally, I do not get why people actually come here – for Borobudur and related sites, it is not closer than Jogja, which has another infrastructure altogether and isn’t really very unrelaxing either.  The next town, Magelang, is pretty much free of good restaurants, shops, sites or really anything.  The countryside is quite lovely but not special either, and as I said the Villa itself is within a village, not a country retreat and far from other sites like the Dieng Plateau.   And the place itself is not one to laze around and spend the day at, unless one wants to stay in one’s loggia and use the pool, which for me is not day-filling.

So, the mystery remains, but perhaps only for me and a few others.  I am sure there are many “can’t fault”, “lovely home away from home”, “great hospitality” and “amazing experience” reviews still to come.  Once again, for me too, this was not a bad place to stay, but the experience wasn’t excellent nor, in sum, really very good, because of the drawbacks.
title: the mystery villa

text:
If you are looking for a place that looks like it was just assembled from an Italian design catalogue with 140 TV channels and a huge night scene, then isn't the place for you.

If, on the other hand, you are looking for the perfect place to relax and do nothing, then Villa Sumbing Indah is perfect.

The owners and hosts, Yanti and Christophe, along with their staff make you feel like you are home.

I chose the Villa Sumbing Indah for a short break to see the Borobudur and Prembaban temple complexes from the Trip Advisor reviews. All the 5 start reviews were right.

Through Christophe and the staff, my tours to Borobudur and Prembanan were taken care of, organising their driver Argus to take me to the sunrise over Borobudur one morning and to Prembanan on another.

They also organised the transfer from Yogyakarta station for me and also back to the airport to get my plane for my onward flight.

Christophe was also going to organise my onward travel and accommodation for a trip to Mt Bromo, that was unfortunately cancelled due to work. Staying an extra night was no problem.

The breakfasts were brilliant, again not the range found at big resorts, but a personal breakfast of fresh breads and pastries, fresh home made jams, fresh juice and great coffee with eggs cooked to order.

Dinners were great, just what was needed after a day of touring or doing nothing. A good range of French style and local dishes, and the price was also great.

A pleasant surprise was the complimentary fruit drinks when you returned from a tour, and for me afternoon tea of caramelised bananas and apple pie on my first day when I did nothing.

The rooms are simple, clean and very comfortable. No air con, as it isn't needed and plenty of insect netting provided. They are also located only a few steps from the inviting pool.

I will definately be returning to Villa Sumbing Indah as it is a great place away from the rate race with a fantastic outlook and great staff and hosts. 

I definately rate this as one of my favourite places to stay.
title: Perfect place to relax and unwind

text:
I have been putting off writing a review for this place, and I am very sorry. I went there about a month ago, but the memory is still fresh in my mind, just as the fresh air and fresh everything of the villa! From the very beginning of my reservation, Ibu Rubi, the villa's owner has been very helpful and informative. She arranged for a car to pick us up from Jogja (where we flew to from Jakarta) to the villa. The driver I have to note, was very friendly and did not mind stopping by for us to have lunch before arriving at the villa. When we arrived, we were greeted by the friendliness of the staff. As we stayed there it was obvious that the staff were professionally trained. They are very welcome and helpful to our needs and wants. We rented one family villa and one villa for 2. I am very delighted with the design and the cleanliness of the villa. The pool is the center of the activities. Our 3 kids were just happy there all day playing between the swimming pool, the fish pond and the tree house. We just lazed around for 3 days, where the adults got some very good massage and good food. Oh don't forget the food! The restaurant in the villa was top-of-the-class. I especially enjoyed their very fresh and yummy home-made papaya and mango jam for breakfast. We happened to be there on my birthday, and Ibu Rubi kindly helped my husband bought a surprise birthday cake for me. It was very sweet. She even gave me a birthday gift!

In overall, I really really love staying here, with the quietness, the view the air... it was heaven! Totally recommended for travelers especially those who would like a quick getaway from the city like us. Thank you Ibu Rubi for keeping such a beautiful place!
title: A Home in the Mountains
